title: Looking for the following T206 cards

posts.post_title: Looking for the following T206 cards
posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following T206 in PSA/SGC 3-4 (2-3 for the Willis) in backs other than Sweet Cap or Piedmont and would love to add Sovereign, Tolstoi, Cycle, Polar Bear, etc. to my Cardinal set.  Please let me know if you can help me out. Thanks!

Jap Barbeau

Charlie Rhodes
